snapshot_info.description: Added DATA RETRIEVAL RULES section to AI Agent system prompt to fix memory staleness issue

changes_applied.description: Added DATA RETRIEVAL RULES section at top of system prompt

fix_details.issue: AI returns cached data from Conversation Memory instead of calling tools
fix_details.root_cause: LLM uses conversation memory for data queries instead of always calling database tools
fix_details.solution: Added explicit instructions at top of system prompt to ALWAYS call tools for data queries, NEVER use memory for data
fix_details.section_added: ## DATA RETRIEVAL RULES (CRITICAL - NEVER USE MEMORY FOR DATA!)
